barrage of links
no bothered to give you some long commentary on anything in my life. 
here are some cool links. just go visit them. i'll provide a synopsis

listened to a whole playlist worth of philip glass yesterday. fav is madrush. a blend of popular music and classical. not musically challenging for the ear but it's just an awesome listen when you wanna purge your mind
(this is part 1; click for part 2 if you want)

and for the same reason. here's tactics for english football. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Formation_(association_football)

studying for math exam. this comes into use http://tutorial.math.lamar.edu/Extras/StudyMath/ProblemSolving.aspx
